skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: As a front-end developer, I specialize in crafting the visual and interactive elements of websites. I bring creativity to life through code, ensuring a seamless and engaging user experience.

skills.title: Creative
skills.description: As a creative, I thrive on turning ideas into reality. Whether through art, design, or innovative thinking, I enjoy bringing a unique and imaginative touch to everything I do.

skills.title: Multitask
skills.description: As a multitasker, I excel in efficiently managing and juggling various responsibilities. I thrive in dynamic environments, adept at handling diverse tasks simultaneously to achieve optimal results.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: I specialize in Webflow development, seamlessly blending design and functionality to create visually appealing and user-friendly websites.
